articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website
articles.contents:
I chose to make this website because I believe that being modest is part of our deen (Islam).
“Every religion has its distinct characteristic, and the distinct characteristic of Islam is modesty.” It was narrated from Abu Bakr (RA) that the Messenger of Allah (SAW) said: “Modesty is part of faith, and faith will be in Paradise. Obscenity in speech is part of harshness and harshness will be in Hell.’”

articles.title: Clothing
articles.contents: Modest fashion made easy with our timeless collections, made for all. Our huge range of clothing and size ranges means there is something for everyone to wear, whilst maintaining the beauty of modesty. Begin your journey with Modesty by Sidrah, the right way.
